thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Rebekah

author: Rebekah
title: Rebekah
text: I love ThriftBooks' large selection, low prices, and free shipping on orders over $10. I've ordered dozens of books through here, and I've rarely been disappointed. Typically, books listed as in "good" or better condition are totally worth it (only occasionally do I find "good" books with writing/highlights in them). But overall, the book-lover in me can't say no to these deals!
